name: ApacheJMeterLoadTest
description: Runs the Apache JMeter load test in cloud
helpMarkDown: This task can be used to trigger an Apache JMeter load test in cloud using Visual Studio Team Services. [Learn more](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=784929)
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: VS Team Services Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a previously registered service connection to talk to the cloud-based load test service. Choose 'Manage' to register a new connection.

inputs.name: TestDrop
inputs.label: Apache JMeter test files folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root where the load test files are available.

inputs.name: LoadTest
inputs.label: Apache JMeter file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Apache JMeter test filename to be used under the load test folder specified above.

inputs.name: agentCount
inputs.label: Agent Count
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of test agents (dual-core) used in the run.

inputs.name: runDuration
inputs.label: Run Duration (sec)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Load test run duration in seconds.
